description:
Umeya Tsuba excels in academic as well as athletic pursuits, and has devotedly followed that path.
Even as a freshman, he was throwing his senpais around and was the hope of the judo club.
All of the sudden he switched to the soccer club and challenges Aoyama-kun to a duel!
Umeya is relentless and keeps at it, but his gaze is on the real reason why he joined the soccer club...
Source: crunchyroll
